cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with communication systems and their performance metrics, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the tradeoff between energy consumption and age-of-information, which is relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Additionally, the paper considers a threshold-based retransmission policy, which is related to the Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-category. Finally, the paper uses analytical and numerical methods to study the performance metrics, which is relevant to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
